problem_names:
lemma hull_rel_relcomp_subset:
  assumes "eqvt R"
  shows "R O hull_rel \<subseteq> hull_rel O R"

lemma wf_hull_rel_relcomp:
  assumes "wf R" and "eqvt R"
  shows "wf (hull_rel O R)"

lemma hull_rel_relcompI [simp]:
  assumes "(x, y) \<in> R"
  shows "(p \<bullet> x, y) \<in> hull_rel O R"

lemma hull_rel_relcomp_trivialI [simp]:
  assumes "(x, y) \<in> R"
  shows "(x, y) \<in> hull_rel O R"

goal (1 subgoal):

inductive_set hull_rel where
  "(p \<bullet> x, x) \<in> hull_rel"

lemma hull_rel_relcomp_subset:
  assumes "eqvt R"
  shows "R O hull_rel \<subseteq> hull_rel O R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. R O hull_rel \<subseteq> hull_rel O R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> R O hull_rel \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> hull_rel O R

proof (chain)
picking this:

obtain x1 x2 y where x: "x = (x1,x2)" and R: "(x1,y) \<in> R" and "(y,x2) \<in> hull_rel"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> R O hull_rel

goal (1 subgoal):

        \<lbrakk>x = (x1, x2); (x1, y) \<in> R;
         (y, x2) \<in> hull_rel\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>

proof (state)
this:

  (x1, y) \<in> R
  (y, x2) \<in> hull_rel

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x = (x1, x2)
  (x1, y) \<in> R
  (y, x2) \<in> hull_rel

proof (prove)
using this:
  x = (x1, x2)
  (x1, y) \<in> R
  (y, x2) \<in> hull_rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>p. y = p \<bullet> x2 \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis

proof (state)
this:
  y = p \<bullet> x2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> R O hull_rel \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> hull_rel O R

proof (chain)
picking this:

proof (prove)
using this:

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x. x \<in> R O hull_rel \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> hull_rel O R

picking this:
  - p \<bullet> y = x2

proof (prove)
using this:
  - p \<bullet> y = x2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (- p \<bullet> x1, x2) \<in> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  - p \<bullet> y = x2
  (x1, y) \<in> R
  eqvt R

goal (1 subgoal):

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:
  (- p \<bullet> x1, x2) \<in> R

proof (state)
this:

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (- p \<bullet> x1, x2) \<in> R
  (x1, - p \<bullet> x1) \<in> hull_rel

proof (prove)
using this:

goal (1 subgoal):
